content.d: It’s ready! Please taste it, You!
Munch... Mmm, this is great! Delicious!
That’s a relief! It’s all thanks to your detailed instructions.
Nom, nom... But why did you suddenly want to learn how to make Youkisoba?

The truth is... Recently, Honoka has only been eating bread... I’ve been telling her to have a balanced diet with vegetables and protein, but she hasn’t been listening... She loves Youkisoba, so I know she’ll eat this.
Oh, I see~ I’m glad you chose to make Youkisoba. Hey, hey, let’s write “UMI” instead of “YO” with the ketchup!
Eh? Is that alright? I thought those letters are what make it Youkisoba...
Since I’m here, I’ll allow it! It’ll be Umisoba! I’m sure Honoka-chan will be even happier that way~
Thank you! I’ll do it then...
Your writing looks great! Let’s find Honoka-chan and have her eat it!
